title: GAME WON'T START UP
body: Not really mad, but i am gosh damn tired of having to delete and then re-install the game because it wont even start up from the desktop... idk wtf is going on with it but it sure is getting old.. any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: "Ctr+Alt+Del" click on "Task Manager" right click on "League of Legends (TM).exe (the Dark blue icon - since this is for the game itself - while the light blue one is for the Menu)" then "End task". The option to "Reconnect" - should appear in the menu - close task manager first then try that and it will try to start again. If same shit happens again - repeat this process till it starts.

>  idk wtf is going on

That often? Your drive is corrupted and/or dying.

> [{quoted}](name=SquealLikePig,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Nwc39K62,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-26T16:55:32.463+0000)
>
> because it wont even start up from the desktop...

Try "Run as Administrator" by right clicking the .exe.

It may also be something different. You may have an instance already running and it won't let you start a new one. For that the fix is different:

1. Open your [Task Manager](https://turbofuture.com/computers/How-to-Open-Task-Manager-on-a-PC)
2. Go to your processes and order them by name
3. Find every "League of Legends" instance and terminate them. Simply right click then "Terminate" or Left Click then DELETE key.
